data.comment: The match is underway in Sao Paulo.
Gilberto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bahia.
In the minute 1, Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rafael Traci signals a Bahia throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 2, Free kick Bahia.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 6, Willian scores to make it 1-0 at Allianz Parque.
Great play from Mayke to set up the goal.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Matias Vina of Palmeiras is pulled up for offside.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 14, Bahia to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Rodriguinho for Bahia drives towards goal at Allianz Parque. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Bahia at Allianz Parque.
Important block from the Bahia defence as Gabriel Menino fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 19, Gustavo Gomez (Palmeiras) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Raphael Veiga for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 20, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match at Allianz Parque has been interrupted briefly for a check on Douglas Friedrich, who is down injured.
Douglas Friedrich for Bahia is back on the field again.
In the minute 21, Bahia drives forward and Rodriguinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Sao Paulo Palmeiras drive forward through Mayke. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Bahia.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 25, Attention is being given to Palmeirasâ€™s Benjamin Kuscevic and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 28, Benjamin Kuscevic (Palmeiras) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Bahia defenders.
Bahia's Zeca gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Parque. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Benjamin Kuscevic is back on his feet again.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
In the minute 31, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Gilberto of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 33, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Penalty! Rafael Traci points to the spot, great chance for Palmeiras...
It's now 2-0 to Palmeiras as Raphael Veiga scores from the spot.
In the minute 37, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Juan Pablo Ramirez for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Rafael Traci awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Mayke gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Bahia at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In Sao Paulo Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino is caught offside.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Goal! Rony extends Palmeiras's lead to 3-0.
Raphael Veiga with an assist there.
In the minute 45, Can Bahia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Gilberto (Bahia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 46, Palmeiras make their first substitution with Anibal Vega replacing Rony.
Alan Empereur is replacing Gustavo Gomez for the home team.
The away team replace Rodriguinho with Rossi.
In the minute 46, Clayson is on a sub for Matheus Bahia for Bahia.
Nino Paraiba is on a sub for Anderson Martins for Bahia.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras's Anibal Vega gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Parque. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Rafael Traci blows against Palmeiras's Willian for offside.
Bahia's Gilberto is on target but unsuccessful.
Rafael Traci waits before resuming play because Gilberto for Bahia is still down.
In the minute 53, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 55, Bahia's Nino Paraiba gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Rafael Traci signals a Bahia throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 56, Gilberto has recovered and rejoins the match in Sao Paulo.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rossi of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
It seems as if Gilberto is unable to continue. Gabriel Novaes replaces him for the away team.
In the minute 59, Abel Ferreira (Palmeiras) is making a third substitution, with Gustavo Scarpa replacing Raphael Veiga.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Bahia drives forward and Ernando gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 61, Rafael Traci signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Palmeiras's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 63, Palmeiras's Gustavo Scarpa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Rafael Traci awards Bahia a goal kick.
Juan Pablo Ramirez (Bahia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 64, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bahia just outside Palmeiras's area.
Alan Empereur is booked for the home team.
Willian gets his shot on target but fails to score for Palmeiras.
In the minute 66, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Palmeiras are in shooting range from this free kick.
Clayson (Bahia) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 69, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The home team have replaced Matias Vina with Marcos Rocha. This is the fourth substitution made today by Abel Ferreira.
Bahia's Clayson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 71, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Bahia make their fifth substitution with Fessin replacing Juan Pablo Ramirez.
Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, Bahia push forward at Allianz Parque and Clayson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Palmeiras defence.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Zeca (Bahia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 73, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
The home team replace Emerson Santos with Luan Garcia.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Palmeiras are pushing forward but Anibal Vega's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 77, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Bahia.
Gregore (Bahia) gets a yellow card.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 79, Marcos Rocha (Palmeiras) has received a yellow card from Rafael Traci.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Bahia at Allianz Parque.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Gabriel Novaes for Bahia drives towards goal at Allianz Parque. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 83, In Sao Paulo Bahia attack through Clayson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
In the minute 87, Palmeiras drive upfield and Gustavo Scarpa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Benjamin Kuscevic heads the ball against the upright! Almost a goal there for Palmeiras.
In the minute 87, Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 89, Ronaldo of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rafael Traci awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Rafael Traci will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Sao Paulo, Rossi of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
That's full-time at Allianz Parque. The final score is 3-0.
